snippet.title: Kinect Sesame Street TV Trailer
snippet.description:
Kinect Sesame Street TV Trailer. Join us on Facebook : http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial. Kinect Sesame Street TV is a interactive TV-style game being developed by Microsofts Soho studio in London !

Kinect Sesame Street TV Trailer. Release date : Fall 2012. Suscribe now to get all gameplay trailers and videos !
